name: Project Lodus - A Cyberpunk Co-op Action RPG
blurb: Grab some friends and fight your way through a long-since abandoned cyberpunk city in this Co-op ARPG.

rewards.reward: No Reward
Backer title and color on your username in our forums. + An exclusive Project Lodus digital wallpaper pack. + Your initials in the credits of the final game.

An exclusive digital download print-ready PDF book that will cover behind the scenes of the early development of the studio and include lots of cool concept art from Project Lodus. + Includes all previous unlimited reward tiers.

You asked and we answered! Get a digital copy of the game for free when it comes out. Keep in mind, with platform and publishing deals still up in the air this is not a 100% guarantee, but we\u2019ll make sure you never get short-changed. + Includes all previous unlimited reward tiers.
Digital download of the Project Lodus original soundtrack when it is finished. + Your full name in the credits of the final game. + Includes all previous unlimited reward tiers.

Founder's Club title and color on your username in our forums. + Access to the special Founder's Club area of our forums where you'll get an even more in depth look at what we're working on. + Your full name and a Tweet length message (140 characters) in the credits of the final game. + Includes all previous unlimited reward tiers.
Access to our private playable beta. Regardless of release platforms, the beta will be on PC. + Includes all previous unlimited reward tiers.

The co-op gaming special! When the game comes out, get three more digital copies for free that you can give to your friends. Make sure you have buddies at your side when you first step onto planet Lodus. + Includes all previous unlimited reward tiers.

5"x7" mini print of a piece of concept art for Project Lodus signed by the artist. We'll print it on nice paper and ship it to you without a frame or mat. Add $15 for international shipping. + Includes all previous unlimited reward tiers.

Leviathan Interactive standard issue company t-shirt. You get to dress up like us! Not included: crippling obsession over "the pixels" or dark, sleepless eyes. Add $15 for international shipping. + Includes all previous unlimited reward tiers.

Access to the vertical slice private playtest on PC. This is the demo we would normally just show to potential investors. You'll get an unparallelled super early access to the portion of the game this Kickstarter directly funds and as a result you'll be the first group to give direct feedback on Project Lodus. + Includes all previous unlimited reward tiers.

11"x14" print of a piece of concept art for Project Lodus signed by the artist. We'll print it on nice paper and ship it to you without a frame or mat. Add $15 for international shipping. + Includes all previous unlimited reward tiers.

Your name will appear in a level as a part of the set dressing. Signage or graffiti art are good examples of how we might do this. We will decide how and where to put your name. Finding it will be half the fun! + Includes all previous unlimited reward tiers.
Exclusive Project Lodus supporter shirt. Will include art and a more elaborate print design. Add $15 for international shipping. + Includes all previous unlimited reward tiers.

Be immortalized as an NPC in Project Lodus. We will model an NPC's face after a picture of yours. Then we probably won't put a giant ridiculous hat on your character and name him Hattie McCrazysauce. Probably. + Includes all previous unlimited reward tiers.

Take the intro class at the Academy of Theatrical Combat on us. One-night crash course on the basics of fighting for stage, screen, and motion capture taught by Project Lodus's very own swordmasters! You must provide your own passage to the Los Angeles area. Sorry, no substitutions for those who can't make it out here. + Includes all previous unlimited reward tiers.

Exclusive Project Lodus supporter shirt. Will include art and a more elaborate print design. We will print your name on the shirt so your friends can't steal it and pretend to be the boss you are. Add $15 for international shipping. + Includes all previous unlimited reward tiers.

Private 2 hour lesson with our very own swordmasters - Jan Bryant and/or Dan Speaker.  They'll teach you everything you need to know about looking like a pro with cutlass, broadsword, and quarterstaff. You must provide your own passage to the Los Angeles area. Sorry, no substitutions for those who can't make it out here. + Also includes the name-customized supporter shirt from the previous tier. + Includes all previous unlimited reward tiers.

Work with us to design a weapon that will appear in Project Lodus. We will organize a Skype session with you to meet about what your ideas are. We will have the final say in what the weapon looks like in-game to keep the integrity of our art direction, but we will try our best to stick with your direction. + Includes all previous unlimited reward tiers.

Be a part of a brainstorming session for a quest we are creating. A group discussion will take place in real time over Skype, with all of you helping us to decide on what we do. + Includes all previous unlimited reward tiers.

Get early Beta access to every Leviathan Interactive game ever. For life. 10 years from now, be the envy of every self-respecting gamer across the world. (See what we did there?) + Includes all previous unlimited reward tiers.

Work with us to design a weapon that will appear in Project Lodus and get a physical full-scale version of that weapon sent to you. Due to our inability to work with live electrical fields, the weapon will have to be limited to a mid level weapon or below. We will organize a Skype session with you to meet about what your ideas are. We will have the final say in what the weapon looks like in-game to keep the integrity of our art direction, but we will try our best to stick with your direction. This is for US backers only. + Includes all previous unlimited reward tiers.

The ultimate Leviathan experience. Come hang out with us for a day. We will show you what we're working on and discuss game design with you so you can have direct input into the game. We'll take you out to dinner and then we'll play some co-op with you. We can play Project Lodus and hang out for a game night. You must provide your own passage to the Los Angeles area, but you can bring one friend with you. + Includes the custom in-game and physical weapon from the previous tier. + Includes all previous unlimited reward tiers.
